description:
App for writing long stories

WonderPen is a professional writing app with a focused and fluid writing experience
- Added Darkroom Mode (enable at Settings → Advanced → Darkoom Mode)
- A new high contrast theme (Dark Yellow)
- Select multiple documents in the directory tree and sort them by title using the right-click menu.
- One-click formatting adds quotation correction rules (default is off, can be manually enabled if needed)
- Fixed some other minor issues
